app.name: LinkNest
app.tagline: Your digital nest to keep what matters

home.title:
Organize your links
in one place
home.subtitle: LinkNest helps you save, categorize, and rediscover any link, from reference articles to inspiring videos, with just one click.

instantlySave.title: Save instantly
instantlySave.subtitle: Add links with a single click and we'll capture the title, favicon, and meta description for you.

sortFind.title: Sort and find
sortFind.subtitle: Tag your links, create categories, and filter by favorites to find what you're looking for in seconds.

share.title: Share with whoever you want
share.subtitle: Create public or private collections to share your best resources with your team or friends.

home.suggestions: Do you have any suggestions or comments?
